about_the_game:
Spelling Spree is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter centered around playing words on a game board. From an overhead view, the same 3D map that serves as an arena for team-vs-team combat becomes a game board where letter tiles can be played to form words and capture territory. It's a battle of wits and reflexes as you compete with other players to capture the most territory and win the game.

In Arena mode, you and your teammates descend to the ground. Your only objective is to collect as many letter tiles as possible, but the other team has the same idea. You're both armed with powerful rifles, and if you've got extra letters to spare, you can lob them like grenades. Navigate the map, collect as many letters as you can, and pin down the enemy team to steal their letters and keep them lexically destitute.

In Board mode, you ascend to an overhead view, where you and your teammates can use the tiles you've collected to spell words on the map. A custom-built crossword engine helps determine legal moves, taking the 3D geometry of the map into account. An intuitive, gamepad-friendly interface ensures that you're able to play words at a breakneck pace: you'll never be staring blankly at a bunch of jumbled-up letters. Play long words to expand your team's territory quickly, or build up densely-packed crosswords to fortify your position and keep the enemy from breaking through.

With each word you and your teammates play, your controlled territory expands. As your territory expands to fill more of the board, your strategic reach in the arena mode expands with it.

It's a war for global dominance, and the only resource that matters? Letters!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM

short_description: It's a word game! It's a team-based shooter! Battle it out in the arena to collect the most letter tiles, then ascend to an overhead view and play words on the arena floor to capture territory for your team. Spelling words on a game board, in a fast-paced shooter, with a gamepad? Yes!
